row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filter" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Format" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service ls ') ! Use --filter if tag given : IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --filter &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#') : ENDIF ! Use --format if tag given : IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FORMAT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --format &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#') : ENDIF ! LOGGING COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING LIST SERVICES COMMAND: &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#"
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST SERVICES ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST SERVICES ACTION FAILED ********"
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ ! Output file : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"result-&$RUNID#.txt")
&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service ls ') : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#, ' --filter &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#')
temp=&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CMD#> temp list=`awk 'NR!=1{print $1}'< temp | paste -s -d,` echo "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS::=$list" count=`wc -l <temp` count=$(($count-1)) list=`awk 'NR!=1{print $2}'< temp | paste -s -d,` echo "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES::=$list" echo "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES::=$count" rm temp
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_IDS#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAMES#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_NO_OF_SERVICES#,,"WORKFLOW"
